It was late, and expecting about a 20 min wait but it was definitely well worth it to sit outside.  Especially when you get random entertainment passing by.  Definitely has all of your classic dishes like jamon iberico, patatas bravas, manchego cheese. Surprisingly I really enjoyed the tripe with chickpeas.  Almost reminded me of a dish you'd typically get at dim sum!  If you're saturated from wine and sangria, definitely try "una clara" - It is a lager plus lemonade and quite refreshing with your meal.  It is considered a girly drink but surely they will still serve it to the gents!
